Package goal.core.agent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AgentFactory<DEBUGGER extends Debugger,CONTROLLER extends GOALInterpreter<DEBUGGER>>
    Constructs agents with a specific GOALInterpreter and Debugger.
    EnvironmentCapabilities
    Provides and abstract representation of the capabilities of the agent in the environment.
    LoggingCapabilities
    Provides an abstract representation of the logging capabilities of the agent.
    MessagingCapabilities
    Provides and abstract representation of the ability of the agent to communicate with other agents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAgentFactory<D extends Debugger,C extends GOALInterpreter<D>>
    Abstract base for building Agents.
    Agent<CONTROLLER extends Controller>
    Generic representation of an agent in the GOAL runtime environment.
    AgentId
    DOC what is this? Unique ID for agents? We should not extend MessagBoxId #2775
    Controller
    Controller for an Agent.
    DefaultEnvironmentCapabilities
    Provides the Agents EnvironmentCapabilities through an EnvironmentPort.
    DefaultLoggingCapabilities
    Provides the Agents LoggingCapabilities through an GOALLogger .
    DefaultMessagingCapabilities
    Provides the agents MessagingCapabilities by using a MessageBox.
    GOALInterpreter<DEBUGGER extends Debugger>
    Interpreter for GOALProgram.
    NoEnvironmentCapabilities
    NOP implementation of EnvironmentCapabilities.
    NoLoggingCapabilities  
    NoMessagingCapabilities
    NOP implementation for messaging.
